TEXT.TITLE: GRAPHIC INDUSTRIES <GRPH> ENDS BUYOUT TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Graphics Industries Inc said it terminated negotiations for the acquisition of <Holladay-Tyler Printing Corp>, Rockville, Md. The companies on March 10 announced that they had signed an agreement in principle for the acquisition. No reason was given termination of the negotiations. Reuter
